Title: Elway: Run game will be Peyton's best friend
Content: Broncos GM John Elway wants the running game to be Peyton Manning's "best friend" in 2015.

Title: Texans/Broncos had 'preliminary' Peyton talks
Content: A source told Sports Radio 610 in Houston that the Texans and Broncos had "very preliminary" discussions regarding a trade that would have sent Peyton Manning to the Texans early this offseason.

Title: Peyton Manning passes physical, signs deal
Content: Peyton Manning is officially returning to the Broncos in 2015.
